Text:
Hi pinball fans and great new pinball game from Microsoft Studios and this edition have 12 fantastic MARVEL tables available to play : AVENGERS, BLADE, FEAR ITSELF, GHOST RIDER, INFINITY GAUNTLET, IRON MAN, MOON KNIGHT, SPIDER MAN, THOR, WOLVERINE ,WORLD WAR HULK AND XMEN ... 

HAVE FUN ... imperdible for pinball fans ...
Thanks for this,grid 2 & call of juarez gunslinger please rip it ...
